column4: How can I have Windows and Ubuntu co-reside on the same machine, but different hard drives?
Ubuntu is currently the master drive
What would I have to change to it in order to get it to find Windows on my other HD though?
no, recommended path is breezy -> dapper -> edgy
sorry, I do have dapper, assuming dapper is 5.10, right?
System -> Preferences -> Keyboard Shortcuts, backspace disables a shortcut
that's the one I was looking for, thanks
